titles.title: Greenhouse Farming Emergency Energy Assistance Act of 2001

To require the Secretary of Agriculture to make emergency loans under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act and to provide emergency assistance to greenhouse farming operations whose energy costs have escalated sharply.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 2/6/2001--Introduced. Greenhouse Farming Emergency Energy Assistance Act of 2001 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to provide assistance to greenhouse farmers who have experienced qualifying energy cost increases.States that such assistance shall not depend upon emergency designation or the existence of a natural disaster in the affected farm's county.
